Key Match Events: Christian Bethancourt drove in seven runs, including a go-ahead two-run single in the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Bethancourt: '(RBI are) a big part of the game. And you get as many as I did today, that’s an unbelievable day. That’s probably a day I will not forget.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pete Crow-Armstrong had a career-high four hits
Others: Pirates manager Derek Shelton fumed after the collapse, admitting 'I don’t know if I’ve been as (angry) as I am right now.'
